description: This action returns details for a specified legal hold. The details are the body of a legal hold in JSON format, in addition to metadata.

parameters.name: LegalHoldId
parameters.description: The ID of the legal hold.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of the legal hold.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the legal hold.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the legal hold.

nested_items.name: CancelDescription
nested_items.description: The reason for removing the legal hold.

nested_items.name: LegalHoldId
nested_items.description: The ID of the legal hold.

nested_items.name: LegalHoldArn
nested_items.description: The framework ARN for the specified legal hold. The format of the ARN depends on the resource type.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The time when the legal hold was created.

nested_items.name: CancellationDate
nested_items.description: The time when the legal hold was cancelled.

nested_items.name: RetainRecordUntil
nested_items.description: The date and time until which the legal hold record is retained.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointSelection
nested_items.description: The criteria to assign a set of resources, such as resource types or backup vaults.

nested_items.name: VaultNames
nested_items.description: These are the names of the vaults in which the selected recovery points are contained.

nested_items.name: ResourceIdentifiers
nested_items.description: These are the resources included in the resource selection (including type of resources and vaults).

nested_items.name: DateRange
nested_items.description: This is a resource filter containing FromDate: DateTime and ToDate: DateTime. Both values are required. Future DateTime values are not permitted.

nested_items.name: FromDate
nested_items.description: This value is the beginning date, inclusive.

nested_items.name: ToDate
nested_items.description: This value is the end date, inclusive.
